 1. Learned Advocate for the parties state that the
 parties have agreed to preliminary decree passed in
 terms of Minutes of Decree. Draft Minutes of Order
 taken on record and marked "X" for identification.
 Accordingly, there will be decree in terms of
 preliminary decree. Accounts to be completed on or
 before 31st December, 2005.
 2. Suit is transferred to the Commissioner for
 Taking Accounts.
 (A.S. Aguiar, J.)
